name: Shadow Work 3
description:
◎ Sound on for the building of structure

All comes from a blank slate
and goes back to a blank slate
In between
delight in the forms
the many shapes
we create together
after all, what else is there

This series depicts the shadow work that goes on deep below. Our shadows are like mythical creatures that drive things in our lives. It's the reason to embrace our dark side because then we have access to its direction & power.
